title: How to Prompt Thinking Models like DeepSeek R1 and OpenAI o3
title1: How to Prompt Thinking Models like DeepSeek R1 and OpenAI o3
title2: How to Prompt Thinking Models like DeepSeek R1 and OpenAI o3
description: Prompting thinking models like DeepSeek R1 and OpenAI o3 requires a different approach than traditional LLMs. Learn the key do's and don'ts for optimizing your prompts, and when to use structured outputs for better results.
author: Lina Lam
